column2: Waterfront House for Sale in Nugegoda [HS09]
column6: Waterfront property with well maintained two story house located 450 meters from Pagoda Road & 1 km from Nawala Road, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. The property offers generous living space along with four bedrooms and three bathrooms. Also featuring a spacious living & dining area, office room and TV lounge.

column2: HS208 - Beautiful house for sale in Gamsabha Junction
column6: Welcoming ambience and the attractive structure of this house makes it an ideal investment for someone looking for a family home in a serene neighborhood. Despite situated in walking distance to high-level road and number of amenities, the property boasts of a calm and quite environment with a beautiful back and front gardens and a rooftop. The interior is well lit with natural lighting and there is good ventilation throughout the house making the house feel very open and airy. The house is built on 10 perches and comes with two living areas, 3 large bedrooms with one en suite bedroom, two smaller rooms, dining room, hot and cold kitchens. Master bedroom is air-conditioned and the two smaller rooms have been used as a gym and study. The cold kitchen is finished with wooden pantry cupboards and there is a separate kitchen for hot cooking. There are balconies around the rooms, a larger balcony adjoining the second floor living room and the rooftop terrace is perfect for small functions or an evening hangout.

column2: House for Sale Delkanda
column6: This house is situated in a tranquil, peaceful, highly residential and well secured gated community located down Andiris Mawatha  (about hundred meters from the main 120 bus route from Horana to Colombo) within walking distance from the Fingara Town & Country Club and is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International and local schools, the Boralesgamuwa walking path, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship. It is an exquisite two storied house with mid-sized garden a swing, Jambu, Mango and Guava trees and is situated on a private road leading to the gated community. The ground floor consists of a combined sitting and dinning room, one bed room with ensuite bathroom, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards and a servant room with a separate toilet outside. The upper floor consists of a sitting area cum TV lounge, two bed rooms including a spacious master bed room,all three rooms with attached bathrooms.The house is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with provisions for air conditioners with A/C in the master bedroom and fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water supply and an overhead tank with pressure pump,separate kitchen with pantry cupboards fitted with granite surface and Built-in Cooker Hob and Hood, the upper floors consists of high roofed white ceiling with exposed rafters and the house is solidly built using quality material. 24X7 security provided by a reputed firm and house is fitted with iron grills for added security for your peace of mind and your children's safety.

Master bedroom has a walk-in-closet. Large ground floor verandah and a rooftop entertainment area ideal for family barbeques.Water supply from the main grid with a 1000 liter overhead and 2000 liter underground reserve. Solar thermal heater for hot water supply with electrical backup heating. Three phase electrical supply. SLT telephone connection. Open ridge roof for natural ventilation. Some custom made furniture (specifically to match the house) will be considered as part of the deal. Property is being sold after the owner has left the country. Phone number given is for the caretaker who is able to arrange for inspections. If interested please ask the caretaker for the owner’s contact details.Price slightly negotiable.
